question.title: What is the fastest way to turn off caps lock on windows
question.body:
I want to make a program that disables caps lock as soon as it is detected so I can use it as a keybind without worrying about my typing being in caps (in java)

I've done this

new ProcessBuilder("powershell", "-Command",
                    "$wshell = New-Object -ComObject WScript.Shell; $wshell.SendKeys('{CAPSLOCK}')").start();

but it takes about a second to actually execute. Is there a faster way of disabling the caps lock? Also is there a faster way to detect this? I have it detecting through a keybind but want to detect when the state is on rather than the keybind
